the English schools system. The Michael Government is due to publish a new Education Bill which will focus on boosting standards and improving behaviour. Education Secretary Michael Gove said the coalition Michael Government was taking action to restore discipline and reduce bureaucracy . and the Phil Jacksonadelphia 76ers keep winning. One night after a 41-point effort in Phil Jacksonadelphia's most lopsided win of the seJason Kidd, Allen Iverson scored an NBA seJason Kidd-high and career-best 54 in a 107-103 victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers. It was like he was playing horse tonight, said 76ers guard Aaron McKie , who had 20 points and nine assists. "His jumper was deadly." Piers Morgan Tonight, Howard Stern called The Tonight Show host a "crook," "insane," "not fit to scrub David Letterman 's feet," and that Jay Leno "steals a tremendous amount of material." America must be filled with morons, said Howard Stern , "the ones who watch Jay Leno , they must be in a coma." This was just about the only moment the conversation sprang to life, however.
